messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A father's view
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/10/00 6:15:56 PM Central Daylight Time, sue.m.e@softhome.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/10/00 6:15:56 PM Central Daylight Time,
sue.m.e@... writes:

<< Stephanie I have followed this thread and know you want it
closed, but to me I feel your husband's attempt to control a natural
function of YOUR body is the tip of the iceberg in his controlling
behaviour, it is an abuse to both you and your child. I would be
concerned about what this childish behaviour of his is a precursor
to, I seriously think he needs counselling. >>

Stephanie,
I have emailed you privately about the above.

*** KiM ***
runs with scissors
